title: Playback
description: Settings related to playback and supported codec and media types

children.title: MPEG 2 Support
children.description: Support direct play of MPEG 2 content (e.g. Live TV). This will prevent transcoding of MPEG 2 content, but uses significantly more bandwidth

children.title: Attempt Direct Play (Profile Lvl)
children.description: Attempt Direct Play for h264 media with unsupported profile levels (> 4.2) before falling back to trancoding if it fails.

title: User Interface
description: Settings relating to how the how the applications looks

children.title: Item Count
children.description: Show item count in the library, and index of selected item.

children.title: Item Titles
children.description: Always show the titles below the poster images. (If disabled, title will be shown under hilighted item only)
